short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Beam finds your favourite creators discount codes and applies them at checkout.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Save money and support your favourite content creators with BEAM! Say goodbye to searching for discount codes - our extension keeps them all in one place and reminds you to use them at checkout. With BEAM, you can enjoy savings and show your support for the creators you love, all in one click. Download now and simplify your shopping with BEAM.

BEAM is a free browser extension that keeps you up to date with your favourite influencers' and content creators' discount codes and affiliate links. When you download BEAM, you will have access to content creator codes conveniently stored on the extension. At the checkout of websites, BEAM will find discount codes from your favourite content creators so that you never miss out on a discount, and you support the creators and influencers you love!
